titleStmt.title: A litle treatise, conteyning many proper tables and rules very necessary for the vse of al men, the contentes wherof appere in the next page folowing. Collected and set forthe by Richard Grafton. 1571.
titleStmt.author: Grafton, Richard, d. 1572?

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Tottelli. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
